summary: The blind masseur and swordsman, Zatoichi, searches for proof an imprisoned man's innocence.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Kanbi Fujiyama|Eiko Taki|Masako Akeboshi|Kenjirô Ishiyama|Ryûzô Shimada|Kôichi Mizuhara|Gen Harada|Yukio Horikita|Jun Katsumura|Hajime Koshikawa|Kayo Mikimoto|Manabu Morita|Kazuo Moriuchi|Sachiko Murase|Tokio Oki
title: Zatôichi sakate giri
